## BubbleDragger class

Class for a bubble dragger. It moves things on the bubble canvas around the workspace when they are being dragged by a mouse or touch. These can be block comments, mutators, warnings, or workspace comments.  Blockly.BubbleDragger

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class BubbleDragger 
```
